description: Semantic retrieval returns chunks outside user scope due to embedding similarity
example_scenario: Alice (junior HR) queries about Bob's projects; retriever returns both project assignments (authorized) and performance reviews (restricted)
defense_gap: Similarity search performed before authorization; access metadata stale or coarse

description: Aggregation and synthesis leak restricted info by combining partial facts
example_scenario: Alice cannot access salary data but model synthesizes 'Bob earns more than average' from authorized headcount + filtered salary chunks
defense_gap: Individual chunk filtering insufficient; synthesis reveals relationships

description: Agent or tool executes under broader privileges than calling user
example_scenario: User-facing agent delegates to 'admin tools' agent with DB write access; calling user read-only scope not propagated
defense_gap: Ambient credentials; service roles; mis-scoped tool access

description: Model reveals restricted info indirectly through summarization or inference
example_scenario: Model infers restricted facts from variance in responses over authorized chunks
defense_gap: Authorization-correct retrieval necessary but not sufficient; inference risk

description: System cannot reconstruct which chunks influenced outputs
example_scenario: Compliance requirement to trace data lineage violated despite authorization filtering
defense_gap: Audit log gaps; no provenance tracking through agentic chains
